text: [Ej pajomʙar] Ba [saʙaʙi] rahmati ilohi ast, ki tu ʙo onon [ashoʙ] narmxu [va mehruʙon] sudi; va agar tundxu va sangdil ʙudi, hatman, az atrofat parokanda mesudand; pas, az eson darguzar va ʙarojason omurzis ʙixoh va dar korho ʙo onon masvarat kun va on goh ki tasmim [ʙar ancomi kore] girifti, ʙar Alloh taolo tavakkal kun; [caro ki] ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo tavakkalkunandagonro dust medorad
